content.rendered:
ROOMS & SUITES

At Caravelle Saigon we have a deep respect for history but not at the expense of comfort and luxury. The decor in our five-star guest rooms meets all the expectations of the modern traveller and business person without losing the essence of what makes our hotel a significant landmark in the city’s history. Choose from a range of room and suite types for a magical stay in the heart of the city.

DELUXE

These rooms are approximately 34sqm (365sqft) with a spacious walk-in vanity and shower including bathroom amenities from the Appelles Classic range and beautifully finished with imported marble throughout.

MORE DETAIL

OPERA

Featuring large soundproofed windows that offer delightful views of Saigon’s historic Opera House. Each comes with a 49” Samsung flat screen TV, free Wi-Fi, and modern decor and furnishings that give it a homely feel.

MORE DETAIL

SIGNATURE

Our Signature rooms are approximately 34sqm (365 sq feet) featuring 49”Samsung flat screen TV, free Wi-Fi, Nespresso coffee machine, luxury bathroom amenities from the Appelles Black range and access to our Signature Lounge.

MORE DETAIL

SIGNATURE PREMIUM

Views over the historic Opera House. All non-smoking rooms at 38.5sqm with spacious walk-in vanity and shower. King-size Sealy Posturepedic bed, pillow menu, luxury Appelles Black range and biodegradable bathroom amenities.

MORE DETAIL

SIGNATURE STUDIO

Our Signature Studio rooms are 43.5sqm (468 sq feet) and are perfect for longer stays including separate living area with comfortable sofa and desk, spacious walk-in vanity and shower.

MORE DETAIL

EXECUTIVE SUITE

All non-smoking rooms from 67 to 87sqm with king-size Sealy Posturepedic bed, separate living room, pillow menu, luxury Appelles Black range and biodegradable bathroom amenities.

MORE DETAIL

OPERA VIEW SUITE

All non-smoking rooms at 90sqm with king-size Sealy Posturepedic bed, separate living room and balcony offers view over Opera House.

MORE DETAIL

HERITAGE SUITE

All non-smoking rooms at 104sqm with king-size Sealy Posturepedic bed, separate living room, kitchen, powder room & balcony.

MORE DETAIL

TWO-BEDROOM SUITE

Non-smoking rooms from 104sqm to 136sqm. Two bed rooms with King & Twin Sealy Posturepedic beds, separate living room, powder room & balcony.

MORE DETAIL

DIPLOMATIC SUITE

Non-smoking room at 136sqm with king-size Sealy Posturepedic bed, separate living room, powder room & balcony.

MORE DETAIL

PRESIDENTIAL SUITE

Non-smoking room at 136sqm with king-size Sealy Posturepedic bed, distinctive décor, separate living room, powder room & balcony

MORE DETAIL
